Description:
KEY REQUIREMENTSSuccessfully completed GCE A/L and fully or part qualified any professional qualification/diploma/degree in materials handling /logistics would be advantageous.
Minimum 3 years work experience at the similar capacity preferably at an automotive parts store.
Good computer literacy with excellent command in MS Excel and experience in SAP material management would be an added advantage.
Display good leadership skills and maintains a high level of customer service.Job Details
